title: Worldwide estimates suggest that nearly 1 in 2 children with cancer are left undiagnosed and untreated

title_detail.value: Worldwide estimates suggest that nearly 1 in 2 children with cancer are left undiagnosed and untreated

summary: A modelling study estimates that there are almost 400,000 new cases of childhood cancer annually, while current records count only around 200,000.

summary_detail.value: A modelling study estimates that there are almost 400,000 new cases of childhood cancer annually, while current records count only around 200,000.
